title: Owner initialization
description: Determine the initialization process of the smart contract owner.
whitepaper: The owner of the smart contract is initialized through a function called `initialize()`, which is susceptible to being front-run, as indicated by the finding labeled "Calls to initialize() can be front-run" with a severity level of Low.
code: The owner of the smart contract is initialized to the address that deploys the contract, as set in the constructor function of the Ownable contract. This is achieved by assigning the deployer's address to the private `_owner` variable and emitting an `OwnershipTransferred` event with the deployer as the initial owner.
